formatted_address: 820 Thomson Rd, #05-01 Medical Centre A, Singapore 574623
name: Cedar Endocrine Clinic @ Mount Alvernia Hospital

reviews.text:
ü©∫ Dr. Tay is truly exceptional, not only is she skillful but her kindness and friendliness create a warm and comforting environment. Her thorough explanations and attention to our concerns make every visit a positive experience.

üè• The staff is nice, they consistently reminding us about our appointments. The clinic is clean and I‚Äôm happy that our appointments are always on time.

Dr. Tay is incredibly knowledgeable, and she takes the time to truly listen to my concerns. I've always felt heard and understood during my appointments, and Dr. Tay provides personalised advice and treatment plans tailored to my specific needs. Her patience and willingness to explain things in detail have been invaluable in guiding me through my thyroid journey. Truly grateful to have found such a dedicated and compassionate doctor. Thank you Dr. Tay üòä Special thanks to the front desk administrative staff for their efficient service and helpful reminders about appointments, making my overall experience pleasant and seamless. üòä

I am seeing Dr Tay for my thyroid. Her assessment was thorough, her warm personality put me at ease and she explains my condition and answers my questions patiently. Clinic staff were polite and friendly, creating great vibes. Highly recommended.

Dr Tay Tunn Lin is an exceptionally skilled endocrinologist and her specialties are in diabetes and thyroid disorders. She has the empathy and ability to care for others, thorough in her assessment and gave the best treatment options. I have been with Dr Tay for over two years and am incredibly grateful to her.

Heartfelt thanks to her attentive care and her highly efficient team who makes the visit extra welcoming and pleasant.

Dr Tay and the entire staff at Cedar Endocrine Clinic truely are amazing. From the moment I entered the office, I felt welcomed, cared for and completely at ease. Dr Tay goes above and beyond to ensure that my complete health and wellness have been made first priority. The office is inviting and all staff members are friendly and helpful in every way. I would highly recommend Dr Tay to anyone seeking answers to better their health and do so in a personalised way.
